---
title: "testing zero inflation"
output: html_document
date: "2024-04-19"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, here, fitdistrplus)
```

read in fishscapes data first

```{r}
fs.data<-read_csv(here("data","fishscapes.cpue.pe.ef.cpe.csv"))
hist(fs.data$anCPUE)
hist(fs.data$nCaught)

# actually let'd do absolute catch

fit.pois<-fitdist(fs.data$nCaught, "pois")
fit.nbinom<-fitdist(fs.data$nCaught, "nbinom")

plot(fit.pois)
plot(fit.nbinom)
```

```{r}
hist(fs.data$anCPUE)

fs.data.f<-filter(fs.data, anCPUE>0)

fit.gamma<-fitdist(fs.data.f$anCPUE, "gamma")
plot(fit.gamma)
```


Compare it to angler diaries

```{r}
data.diary<-read_csv(here("data","angler.diary.data.csv"))

hist(data.diary$LGBassNumCaught)
hist(data.diary$WalleyeNumCaught)


fit.pois<-fitdist(data.diary$LGBassNumCaught, "pois")
fit.nbinom<-fitdist(data.diary$LGBassNumCaught, "nbinom")

plot(fit.pois)
plot(fit.nbinom)

```
